name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
overview: In the black of night he stalks his unwitting victims with the passion of a prince and the grace of a wild animal. He is the Prince of Darkness–Count Dracula–and he's cast his hypnotic spell on your lovely mistress, Mina Murray. Now you, Jonathan Harker, must nail this notorious bloodsucker to the stake and save the fair Mina from a fate worse than death–eternal life as a vampiress.
